• Increases speed of caster by 2.0%
  • Increases Ground Mount Speed of caster by 2.0%

• Increases speed of caster by 4.0%
  • Increases Ground Mount Speed of caster by 4.0%

• Increases speed of caster by 6.0%
  • Increases Ground Mount Speed of caster by 6.0%

  • Increases Ground Mount Speed of caster by 8.0%

• Increases speed of caster by 10.0%
  • Increases Ground Mount Speed of caster by 10.0%
aa.name: Innovative Insoles

aa.description: Refunds a portion of a recipes build components upon recipe completion.
effects: • Increases build components returned by 4.0%
• Increases build components returned by 8.0%
• Increases build components returned by 12.0%
• Increases build components returned by 16.0%
• Increases build components returned by 20.0%
aa.name: Systematic Conservation

aa.description: Has a chance to refine certain raw harvestables into pure harvestables.  An equipment item crafted with a pure primary component will have higher attributes.  Higher tiers of this ability will lower the cooldown.
effects: • Cannot be modified except by direct means
• Cannot be modified except by direct means
• Cannot be modified except by direct means
• Cannot be modified except by direct means
• Cannot be modified except by direct means
aa.name: Refine

aa.description: Allows the artisan to experiment on an item.  Experimentation can either add a proc, add a decoration, or boost the stats of an item.  Higher ranks of this ability increase the total amount of times you can experiment on an item.  Additionally, higher ranks of this ability will improve your experimentation reaction arts.
effects: • Increases number of times experimentation can be applied to an item by 1.0
• Increases number of times experimentation can be applied to an item by 2.0
• Increases number of times experimentation can be applied to an item by 3.0
• Increases number of times experimentation can be applied to an item by 4.0
• Increases number of times experimentation can be applied to an item by 5.0
aa.name: Experimentation

aa.description: Enables the artisan to craft multiple items at a time.  Higher tiers of this ability increase the maximum crafting quantity.  Conservation of Mass does not apply when Mass Producing, and Mass Produced items will not count for quest updates.
effects: • Increases max crafting quantity by 5.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 10.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 25.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 50.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 100.0
aa.name: Mass Production
